DISCOVERY AND THINGS LIKE THAT.
MAY NOT BE SUCH A BAD THING.

BUT YOU ADD UP ALL THE PEOPLE WHO STOPPED LOOKING FOR WORK.
YOU ADD UP THE PEOPLE WHO HAVE PART-TIME JOBS AND THESE PART-TIME JOBS PAY HALF AS MUCH
AS THE MEDIAN WAGE.

AREN'T GETTING BETTER.

CONDUCIVE FOR CORPORATIONS AS IT IS IN INDIA AND CHINA.

WE'VE EARNED OUR MIDDLE-CLASS STATUS AND I DON'T KNOW THAT...

WE JUST CAN'T COMPETE.

FIREFIGHTERS, YOU'RE LAYING OFF POLICEMEN.

UNEMPLOYED, FEWER PEOPLE WHO CAN BUY STUFF, FEWER PEOPLE GOING TO DINERS, FEWER PEOPLE
CONTRIBUTING TO THE ECONOMY.
